About Me

Hello my name is Ruben Esquivel and I like working on projects for Graphic Design, Photo Retouching, Photo Manipulation, Web / UI Design, Web Development, & HTML Emails.

I come from a Graphic Design background with 10 years experience working in the industry running an entire graphics department by myself. For Fun I love Traveling and Riding my Bike and working on amazing projects.

  • Graphic Design

  • Web Development

For this website, I wanted to use my design skills along with web development skills to make this website really pop. So I took a photo that was taken of me of my nephew at a recent vacation to Yellow Stone and added some photo retouching along with photo manipulation and created the graphics for the "Portfolio" to this photo. Once this was done I then used the final image for the web design. Once the web design was done then I converted the .psd to this website. I honestly believe knowing design with web development is the perfect combination to create beautiful websites.

You can download the header .psd file by clicking on the link above. On the 2nd portfolio piece for this website, you can download the entire website design layout with the header image merged into a single file.

For this website I created the ui / web design in photoshop. Once I was done with the design I converted the psd into pixel perfect website using html css & javascript. This was the first website I coded from scratch without using any themes. Unfortunately the customer never got around to updating his hosting so I uploaded this website on a personal domain for now.

For this website I used a Woocommerce theme to sell photo booth templates. Before updating the theme I created the web deisgn layout first Photoshop. Then I updated the theme with custom graphics I created and uploaded the products I created.

I designed the logo, header, buttons, and products in photoshop. I also created a custom email sign up form in html css where I give away 5 free templates to collect emails.

I built this website for a mulching company. Origianlly I built this website with a wordpress theme but after it was built I felt like the website was loading up a little bit slow and we were having database issues. So I then rebuilt this website using only html css and vanilla javascript.

For this website I created the ui / web design in photoshop. Once I was done with the design I converted the psd into pixel perfect website using html css & javascript. This was the first website I coded from scratch without using any themes. Unfortunately the customer never got around to updating his hosting so I uploaded this website on a personal domain for now.

For this website I designed the ui / web deisgn in Photoshop. Once I was done designing the website I converted the psd into a website with html css javascript and a jquery librairy for portfolio filter.
